CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( CONTAINS( $User.Profile_Name__c, 'Sales'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Accepted - Completed Follow-Up')), HYPERLINK('apex/UpdateOrResetRLorAP?retURL=/' & Id & '&id=' & Id & '&action=Update', IMAGE("resource/1257839368000/MA_UpdateRecord", 'Update Record'), '_parent'),
IF( AND( CONTAINS( $User.Profile_Name__c, 'Sales'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Rejected - Completed Follow-Up')), HYPERLINK('apex/UpdateOrResetRLorAP?retURL=/' & Id & '&id=' & Id & '&action=Update', IMAGE("resource/1282810384000/MA_UpdateRecord2", 'Update Record'), '_parent') & ' ' & HYPERLINK('apex/UpdateOrResetRLorAP?retURL=/' & Id & '&id=' & Id & '&action=Reset', IMAGE("resource/1282810236000/MA_Reset", 'Reset Record'), '_parent'),
IF( AND(!ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Routed to Channel'), !ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Routed to Segment'), OR( CONTAINS( $User.Profile_Name__c, 'Marketing'), CONTAINS( $User.Profile_Name__c, 'System'), CONTAINS( $User.Profile_Name__c, 'Lead Assignment'), CONTAINS( $User.Profile_Name__c, 'IT') )), HYPERLINK(Id & '/e?nooverride=1&retURL=/' & Id, IMAGE("resource/1254277273000/MA_UpdateRecord", 'Update Record'), '_parent'), ' ')))
CustomField.label: Update Record
